column4: My Feistyserver kernelpaniced. It also did it with Dapper. How can I find the reason?
, It just froze. Couldn't SSH, couldn't ping, could FTP to it.
No, just died. I remote it. It's basic installation with rtorrent and a non fully installation of VMWare. But I had the same setup with Dapper and also experienced the same problem.
try with boot parameters: noapic noscsi
I don't have a monitor to it.
thats bad. you need to get one(or KVM console)
I can connect a monitor, but I don't have space right now for it.
I have more space next week.
then fix it next week, hee
If it's possible. I hate when it is like this. :-( I don't think there's problem with three versions. I think it's something with my computer.
It's installed, but it's not found in mem then tab.
get "deep purple - child in time" while waiting ;)
I'm running the test now. I might be my systemharddrive cause it's a relly old one.
